description: A simple and quick recipe for mayonnaise.
keywords: Mayonnaise,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Maionese (Mayonnaise) Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor add egg yolks and juice of a lemon.
Blend on medium speed until well combined.
Start to pour in olive oil slowly while food processor is going until you finish all sunflower oil.
Continue to blend for 1 minute and stop the food processor.
Add pinch of salt to mixture and blend until you get a smooth and creamy consistency.
Transfer to bowl to use straight away or store in fridge until needed. Enjoy!
